meanings.definition: Mysterious or secret knowledge or information.
meanings.sent1: The ancient book contained arcane secrets of magic and spells.
meanings.sent2: The group of wizards gathered to discuss the arcana of the enchanted forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to possess some arcane knowledge of where the treats were hidden.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an arcana that hinted at a past full of mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The old map revealed the arcana of hidden treasure buried deep within the island.

meanings.definition: Specialized knowledge or information known only to a select few.
meanings.sent1: The professor shared his arcana of ancient languages with his students.
meanings.sent2: The arcana of the secret society were closely guarded by its members.
meanings.sent3: The chef's arcana of creating the perfect souffle was a closely kept secret.
meanings.sent4: Her arcana of computer coding made her an invaluable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: The arcana of the art world were slowly revealed to the aspiring painter.

meanings.definition: A secret or hidden aspect of something.
meanings.sent1: The detective uncovered the arcana of the case hidden in plain sight.
meanings.sent2: The arcana of the ancient ruins held clues to a lost civilization.
meanings.sent3: The arcana of the recipe was the special ingredient known only to the chef.
meanings.sent4: His smile hid an arcana of sadness that few could see beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The arcana of the forest whispered secrets to those who listened closely.
